input_args.passage: 'Georges-Henri Bousquet - Wikipedia | He is also known for his translation work of the great Muslim authors, Al-Ghazali, a theologian who died in 1111 and Tunisian historian Ibn Khaldun (1332–1406)., Ibn Khaldun'
